item.title: 价格上涨缓慢，但联合利华和其他公司难以赢回购物者
item.description:
Packaged goods makers including Unilever (ULVR.L) and Nestle (NESN.S) disappointed investors with weak third-quarter sales volumes, but that could change in the coming months as price increases moderate.

联合利华(ULVR.L)和雀巢(NESN.S)等包装商品制造商第三季度销量疲软令投资者感到失望，但随着价格上涨温和，这种情况可能在未来几个月发生变化。

Companies have hiked prices since the COVID-19 pandemic to make up for higher costs, prompting some shoppers to look for better deals. The slide in sales volumes of big brands only grew worse after the Ukraine war sparked a cost of living crisis.

自 COVID-19 大流行以来，各公司提高了价格，以弥补成本上升，促使一些购物者寻找更优惠的价格。乌克兰战争引发生活成本危机后，大品牌销量的下滑更加严重。

Top U.S.

我们 and European investors have this year flagged their concerns about high prices to consumer goods companies. But even though prices are beginning to moderate, consumers have not rushed back.

今年，美国和欧洲的顶级投资者向消费品公司表达了他们对高价格的担忧。但尽管价格开始放缓，消费者并没有急于回归。

Companies need to do more to convince investors that sales volumes can return to growth, Richard Saldanha, an Aviva portfolio manager, said in an interview.

Aviva 投资组合经理理查德·萨尔达尼亚 (Richard Saldanha) 在接受采访时表示，公司需要采取更多措施让投资者相信销量可以恢复增长。

"Across the board, organic growth has been price driven and what we want to see is more of a balance between volume and price," he said, noting the cost of raw materials has decreased and that he hopes prices moderate as a result.

他表示：“总体而言，有机增长是由价格驱动的，我们希望看到的更多是数量和价格之间的平衡。”他指出，原材料成本已经下降，他希望价格能够因此而放缓。

On Thursday, Unilever met market expectations for third-quarter sales growth after raising prices at a slower rate.

周四，联合利华在以较慢的速度提价后， 满足了市场对第三季度销售增长的预期。

"In terms of where pricing is going from here, I think we'll see a continued fall in underlying price growth, but I don't think that's going to go negative," Chief Financial Officer Graeme Pitkethly said.

首席财务官格雷姆·皮特凯斯利 (Graeme Pitkethly) 表示：“就定价的走向而言，我认为我们将看到基本价格增长持续下降，但我认为这不会出现负增长。”

Europe was a particular pain point, with sales volumes tumbling 10.7%.

欧洲是一个特别的痛点，销量下降了 10.7%。

"It's the most difficult trading environment," Pitkethly said.

“这是最困难的交易环境，”皮特凯斯利说。

Unilever's stock fell 2.5% to a year-low in morning trading.

早盘交易中，联合利华股价下跌 2.5%，创一年来新低。

Nestle, the world's biggest packaged food maker, last Thursday posted lower-than-expected nine-month sales growth as higher product prices made shoppers balk.

全球最大的包装食品制造商雀巢上周四公布的九个月销售增长低于预期，原因是产品价格上涨令购物者望而却步。

Similarly, Tide detergent maker P&G (PG.N) this month reported weak sales volumes, but said this was stabilising and would start to pick up.

同样，汰渍洗涤剂制造商宝洁公司(PG.N)本月报告销量疲弱，但表示销量正在稳定并将开始回升。

Shares in Reckitt (RKT.L) also fell by about 2% when the maker of Dettol and Lysol cleaning products on Wednesday missed third-quarter like-for-like sales expectations as volumes declined.

周三，滴露和来苏清洁产品制造商利洁时(RKT.L)的股价也下跌了约 2%，原因是销量下降，第三季度销售额未达预期。

"Consumer staples quarterly results have been underwhelming, where overall volumes remain weak whilst prices are going up less than historically," Waverton Investment Management portfolio manager Tineke Frikkee said.

Waverton Investment Management 投资组合经理 Tineke Frikkee 表示：“消费必需品季度业绩表现不佳，总体销量依然疲软，而价格涨幅低于历史水平。”

One bright spot of the earnings season was Danone (DANO.PA), which on Thursday raised its 2023 sales forecast but kept its guidance for a moderate improvement in operating margin.

达能(DANO.PA)是财报季的一大亮点，该公司周四上调了 2023 年销售预期，但维持了营业利润率适度改善的指引。

"Any good news we have on inflation, we will re-invest in the business," finance chief Juergen Esser said.

财务主管尤尔根·埃塞尔 (Juergen Esser) 表示：“任何有关通胀的好消息，我们都会对业务进行再投资。”

Reporting by Richa Naidu Additional reporting by Dominique Vidalon in Paris Editing by Matt Scuffham and Mark Potter

item.title: 各国政府竞相监管人工智能工具
item.description:
Rapid advances in artificial intelligence (AI) such as Microsoft-backed OpenAI's ChatGPT are complicating governments' efforts to agree laws governing the use of the technology.

人工智能 (AI) 的快速发展，例如微软支持的 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT，使政府就管理该技术使用的法律达成一致的努力变得更加复杂。

Here are the latest steps national and international governing bodies are taking to regulate AI tools:

Sunak added Britain would set up the world's first AI safety institute to "understand what each new model is capable of, exploring all the risks from social harms like bias and misinformation through to the most extreme risks".

Britain's data watchdog said on Oct. 10 it had issued Snap Inc's (SNAP.N) Snapchat with a preliminary enforcement notice over a possible failure to properly assess the privacy risks of its generative AI chatbot to users, particularly children.

英国数据监管机构 10 月 10 日表示，已向 Snap 公司(SNAP.N)的 Snapchat 发出初步执行通知，原因是该公司的生成式人工智能聊天机器人可能未能正确评估其对用户（尤其是儿童）的隐私风险。

The country issued a set of temporary measures in August, requiring service providers to submit security assessments and receive clearance before releasing mass-market AI products.

Guterres has backed a proposal by some AI executives for the creation of an AI watchdog, and announced plans to start work on a high-level AI advisory body by the end of the year.

item.title: 苏纳克表示英国将建立世界上第一个人工智能安全研究所
item.description:
Britain will set up the world's first artificial intelligence (AI) safety institute, Prime Minister Rishi Sunak said on Thursday before he hosts a gathering next week of representatives of AI companies, political leaders and experts.

英国首相里希·苏纳克 (Rishi Sunak) 周四表示，英国将建立世界上第一个人工智能 (AI) 安全研究所，然后下周将召开人工智能公司代表、政治领导人和专家的聚会。

The institute "will advance the world's knowledge of AI safety and it will carefully examine, evaluate and test new types of AI so that we understand what each new model is capable of, exploring all the risks from social harms like bias and misinformation through to the most extreme risks of all," Sunak said in a speech in London.

该研究所“将推进世界对人工智能安全的了解，并将仔细检查、评估和测试新型人工智能，以便我们了解每种新模型的能力，探索从偏见和错误信息等社会危害到其中最极端的风险，”苏纳克在伦敦的一次演讲中说道。

Reporting by William James; Writing by William Schomberg

item.title: 中国称美国无权介入中菲问题
item.description:
The United States does not have the right to get involved in problems between China and the Philippines, the Chinese foreign ministry said on Thursday, as tensions simmer over conflicts in disputed waters of the South China Sea.

中国外交部周四表示，美国无权介入中国和菲律宾之间的问题，因为南海争议海域的冲突引发紧张局势。

"The U.S.

我们 is not party to the South China Sea issue, it has no right to get involved in a problem between China and the Philippines," said ministry spokesperson Mao Ning at a regular press briefing when asked about the U.S.

我们 saying it will defend the Philippines.

China and the Philippines have had several high-profile confrontations in the South China Sea, most notably in disputed waters around the Second Thomas Shoal, part of the Spratly Islands.

中国和菲律宾在南海发生了几次引人注目的对抗，尤其是在仁爱礁（南沙群岛的一部分）周围有争议的海域。

Last Sunday, a Chinese vessel collided with a Philippine boat, with Manila condemning "in the strongest degree" the "dangerous blocking manoeuvres" of the vessel.

上周日，一艘中国船只与一艘菲律宾船只相撞，马尼拉“最强烈地”谴责该船的“危险拦截动作”。

"The U.S.

我们 promise of defending the Philippines must not hurt China's sovereignty and maritime interests in the South China Sea, and it also must not enable and encourage the illegal claims of the Philippines," Mao said.

A spokesperson for the Philippine foreign ministry did not immediately respond to a request for comment.

菲律宾外交部发言人没有立即回应置评请求。

U.S.

我们 President Joe Biden said on Wednesday at the White House that America's commitment to Philippines defence remains "iron-clad," after accusing China of acting "dangerously and unlawfully" in the South China Sea.

"Any attack on the Filipino aircraft, vessels, or armed forces will invoke ... our Mutual Defence Treaty with the Philippines," Biden said in remarks during a joint meeting with Australia's prime minister.

拜登在与澳大利亚总理的联合会议上表示：“对菲律宾飞机、船只或武装部队的任何攻击都将援引……我们与菲律宾的共同防御条约。”

The United States and the Philippines recently agreed on new guidelines for their 1951 Mutual Defence Treaty. The guidelines now specifically mention that mutual defence commitments would be invoked if there were an armed attack on either country “anywhere in the South China Sea”.

美国和菲律宾最近就 1951 年共同防御条约的新指导方针达成一致。该指导方针现在特别提到，如果“南海任何地方”对任何一个国家进行武装袭击，都将援引共同防御承诺。

item.title: 中国关注机场 距离夏威夷2000公里的基里巴斯环礁拥有美国码头
item.description:
A Pacific atoll 2,000 miles west of Hawaii appears set for a construction boom, with the United States and Australia on Thursday pledging a wharf for remote Kanton Island as China considers plans to revive a World War Two airfield.

夏威夷以西 2000 英里处的太平洋环礁似乎将掀起建设热潮，美国和澳大利亚周四承诺为偏远的坎顿岛提供一个码头，而中国正在考虑恢复二战时期机场的计划。

Kiribati's population of 115,000 is scattered among 33 atolls over 3.5 million sq km (1.3 million sq miles) of ocean, and it has been a base for both U.S.

我们 and Chinese space tracking stations at different times.

One atoll, in particular, has recently become a focus for Washington and Beijing, after China resumed diplomatic ties with Kiribati, pronounced "kiribass", in 2019.

尤其是一个环礁，在中国于 2019 年与基里巴斯恢复外交关系（发音为“kiribass”）后，最近成为华盛顿和北京关注的焦点。

Kanton Island is a strip of land just 50 metres wide in some places whose 43-km length encloses a parallelogram-shaped lagoon. During World War Two it was a U.S.

我们 military base, with a wharf big enough for large ships, and a refuelling stop for flights between the United States and Australia.

Kiribati says it wants to build a hotel there to attract tourists.

基里巴斯表示希望在那里建造一家酒店以吸引游客。

In a joint statement on Thursday, U.S.

我们 President Joe Biden and Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said they would co-finance maritime infrastructure in Kiribati, and rebuild Kanton Wharf.

The U.S.

我们 had already committed $29m to help Kiribati youth employment at a White House summit for the Pacific Islands last month.

China for its part sent experts to the atoll in March to conduct a feasibility study to build a Kanton Island Airport, with Chinese visitors able to travel to Kiribati visa-free from this month.

中国方面于3月份派出专家前往该环礁进行建设坎顿岛机场的可行性研究，从本月起中国游客可以免签前往基里巴斯。

A Chinese diplomat in Kiribati told Reuters in a statement on Thursday that the proposal was still being studied.

一名中国驻基里巴斯外交官周四在一份声明中告诉路透社，该提案仍在研究中。

However, a China Daily editorial last month said the U.S.

我们 had tried to block the Chinese plan.

The Chinese diplomat said Kiribati had pulled out of China's Belt and Road Forum in Beijing this month, citing its need to prepare to host a Pacific Islands fisheries meeting. Kiribati's government did not respond to a request for comment.

这位中国外交官表示，基里巴斯已退出本月在北京举行的中国“一带一路”论坛，理由是该国需要准备主办太平洋岛屿渔业会议。基里巴斯政府没有回应置评请求。

A Pacific expert at the Australian National University, Graeme Smith, said that amid strategic competition in the Pacific Islands, Kiribati was seen as a "country up for grabs - whether it sits in the China or U.S.

我们 camp".

"It is western Pacific, which is really America's backyard. It is very close to Hawaii," he said.

“这里是西太平洋，确实是美国的后院。它离夏威夷非常近，”他说。

Washington pledged billions in economic support to nearby Palau, Federated States of Micronesia and Marshall Islands, under Compacts of Free Association (COFA) struck in the 1980s that saw the U.S.

我们 retain responsibility for their defense.

Kiribati, just as important geographically, got no such deal, Smith said.

史密斯说，基里巴斯在地理位置上同样重要，但没有达成这样的协议。

item.title: 联合利华新任首席执行官制定简化业务计划，股价下跌
item.description:
Unilever's (ULVR.L) new chief executive Hein Schumacher on Thursday laid out long-awaited plans to simplify the business after admitting it had underperformed in recent years, but its shares fell as some investors were unimpressed.

联合利华(ULVR.L)新任首席执行官海因·舒马赫 (Hein Schumacher) 周四在承认近年来表现不佳后，制定了期待已久的简化业务计划，但由于一些投资者对此不以为然，该公司股价下跌。

The maker of Dove soap and Ben & Jerry's ice cream met market expectations for third-quarter sales growth after raising prices at a slower rate, but failed to win back some shoppers who turned to cheaper products during a cost of living crisis.

多芬肥皂和本杰瑞冰淇淋的制造商在以较慢的速度提价后，达到了市场对第三季度销售增长的预期，但未能赢得一些在生活成本危机期间转向更便宜产品的购物者。

Schumacher, who took up the role in July, said the company would now focus on 30 key brands which account for 70% of its sales. It will focus on improving its gross margin and not undertake any major or transformational acquisitions, he said.

7月份上任的舒马赫表示，公司现在将重点关注30个主要品牌，这些品牌占其销售额的70%。他表示，该公司将专注于提高毛利率，不会进行任何重大或转型性收购。

"Our performance in recent years has not matched our potential. The quality of our growth, productivity and returns have all under-delivered," Schumacher said.

“我们近年来的表现与我们的潜力不匹配。我们的增长质量、生产力和回报都未能实现，”舒马赫说。

Shares in Unilever fell 2.5% to a year-low in morning trading.

早盘交易中，联合利华股价下跌 2.5%，至一年来最低点。

"I don't think there's anything there that's new in terms of this strategic update," Aviva portfolio manager Richard Saldanha said. "Clearly for investors, from my perspective, getting back to organic growth of 3-5% is key."

Aviva 投资组合经理 Richard Saldanha 表示：“我认为此次战略更新没有任何新内容。” “显然，从我的角度来看，对于投资者来说，恢复 3-5% 的有机增长是关键。”

"The new CEO’s strategy was well presented but overall underwhelming – investing and rewarding for higher growth and no significant portfolio restructuring," Tineke Frikkee, a portfolio manager at Waverton Investment Management, said. "This sounds similar to previous CEOs and will take time to be delivered."

Waverton Investment Management 的投资组合经理 Tineke Frikkee 表示：“新任首席执行官的战略提出得很好，但总体而言并不令人印象深刻——投资和回报更高的增长，并且没有重大的投资组合重组。” “这听起来与前任首席执行官相似，但需要时间才能实现。”

Schumacher replaced Alan Jope who had a rocky final year at Unilever after a bungled attempt to buy GSK's consumer healthcare business and billionaire activist investor Nelson Peltz joining the board.

舒马赫接替了艾伦·乔普(Alan Jope) ，后者在联合利华的最后一年经历了坎坷，此前他曾试图收购葛兰素史克 (GSK) 的消费者医疗保健业务，但行动失败，亿万富翁激进投资者尼尔森·佩尔茨 (Nelson Peltz) 也加入了董事会。

At the same time, the consumer goods industry has struggled for more than two years with soaring costs, as everything from sunflower oil and shipping to packaging and electricity became more expensive during the pandemic.

与此同时，消费品行业两年多来一直在成本飙升的困境中挣扎，因为在疫情期间，从葵花籽油、运输到包装和电力等一切都变得更加昂贵。

Unilever reported a 5.2% rise in underlying sales, meeting analysts' average forecast, a company-provided consensus showed.

公司提供的共识显示，联合利华报告基本销售额增长 5.2%，达到分析师的平均预期。

Underlying price growth for the third quarter was 5.8% while underlying volumes were down 0.6%. Prices increased at a faster pace than expected by analysts, who also forecast that volumes would rise for the first time in about two years. In Europe, volumes were down 10.7%.

第三季度基本价格增长 5.8%，而基本销量下降 0.6%。价格上涨的速度快于分析师的预期，分析师还预测销量将在大约两年内首次出现增长。在欧洲，销量下降了 10.7%。

"That is a feature of the inflation that we've had in our nutrition and our ice cream business...it's the most difficult trade environment," Chief Financial Officer Graeme Pitkethly said. "We've not yet recovered all the inflation in Europe and our European margins have come down and are quite significantly below the average of Unilever."

首席财务官格雷姆·皮特凯斯利 (Graeme Pitkethly) 表示：“这是我们的营养品和冰淇淋业务中通胀的一个特点……这是最困难的贸易环境。” “我们还没有完全恢复欧洲的通货膨胀，我们的欧洲利润率已经下降，并且大大低于联合利华的平均水平。”

The company also announced a senior executive shake-up, naming Fernando Fernandez, currently president of the beauty and wellbeing business, as its new chief financial officer.

该公司还宣布了一项高级管理人员变动，任命现任美容和保健业务总裁费尔南多·费尔南德斯 (Fernando Fernandez) 为新任首席财务官。

Reporting by Richa Naidu; editing by Mark Potter and Jason Neely

item.title: 中国最年轻航天员启程前往空间站
item.description:
The youngest-ever crew of Chinese astronauts departed for China's space station on Thursday, paving the way for a new generation of "taikonauts" to advance the country's space ambitions in the future.

周四，有史以来最年轻的中国航天员启程前往中国空间站，为新一代“航天员”推进中国未来的太空雄心铺平了道路。

The spacecraft Shenzhou-17, or "Divine Vessel", and its three passengers lifted off atop a Long March-2F rocket from the Jiuquan Satellite Launch Centre in northwest China.

神舟十七号飞船及其三名乘客乘坐长征二号F火箭从中国西北部的酒泉卫星发射中心升空。

Leading the six-month mission was former air force pilot Tang Hongbo, 48, who was on the first crewed mission to the space station in 2021.

领导这项为期六个月的任务的是 48 岁的前空军飞行员唐洪波，他于 2021 年执行了首次载人空间站任务。

His return to the orbiting outpost Tiangong, or "Celestial Palace" in Chinese, also set a new record for the shortest interval between two spaceflight missions by taikonauts - coined from the Chinese word for space - suggesting a faster rotation of taikonauts in coming years.

他返回轨道前哨站天宫，也创下了航天员两次航天任务之间最短间隔的新纪录，这意味着未来几年航天员的轮换速度会更快。

Tang, from China's second batch of astronauts in 2010, had to wait more than a decade before he was picked for his inaugural spaceflight in 2021.

唐是2010年中国第二批航天员，等了十多年才被选中参加2021年的首次航天飞行。

By contrast, his fellow Shenzhou-17 crew members Tang Shengjie, 33, and Jiang Xinlin, 35, both travelling to space for the first time, joined China's third batch of astronauts in September 2020.

相比之下，神舟十七号机组成员唐胜杰（33岁）和蒋新林（35岁）都是首次进入太空，于2020年9月加入中国第三批航天员。

China has already kickstarted the selection process for the fourth batch of astronauts, seeking candidates with doctoral degrees in disciplines from biology, physics and chemistry to biomedical engineering and astronomy.

中国已经启动了第四批航天员的选拔工作，寻找具有生物学、物理化学、生物医学工程和天文学等学科博士学位的候选人。

It is also opening the process to applicants from Hong Kong and Macau for the first time.

它还首次向香港和澳门的申请人开放该流程。

The first and second batches of astronauts were all former air force pilots, like Tang, who joined the People's Liberation Army in 1995 at age 20.

第一批和第二批宇航员都是前空军飞行员，比如唐，1995年20岁时加入解放军。

FOREIGN ASTRONAUTS

The selection and training process will commence soon for foreign astronauts looking to participate in joint flights to Tiangong, a senior official on China's manned space program said this year.

中国载人航天计划的一位高级官员今年表示，对于希望参加天宫联合飞行的外国宇航员的选拔和培训过程即将开始。

But as much as China is showcasing its efforts to internationalise its space missions, its space program has distinct Chinese characteristics, at least on Tiangong.

但尽管中国正在展示其太空任务国际化的努力，但其太空计划具有鲜明的中国特色，至少在天宫上是这样。

In a departure from the NASA-led International Space Station (ISS), where English is the working language, only Chinese is used on Tiangong, making Chinese-language skills a key criteria for foreign participants.

与美国宇航局领导的国际空间站（ISS）以英语为工作语言不同，天宫号上只使用中文，这使得中文能力成为外国参与者的关键标准。

Tiangong has become a symbol of China's growing confidence in its space endeavours after being shut out of the ISS program for decades. China is banned by U.S.

我们 law from any collaboration, direct or indirect, with NASA.

Tiangong, completed in late 2022, can house a maximum of three astronauts at an orbital altitude of up to 450 km (280 miles) and will have an operational lifespan of more than 15 years.

天宫号于 2022 年底竣工，最多可容纳三名宇航员，轨道高度高达 450 公里（280 英里）， 使用寿命将超过 15 年。

The Shenzhou-17 astronauts will replace the Shenzhou-16 crew, who arrived at Tiangong at the end of May.

神舟十七号航天员将接替五月底抵达天宫的神舟十六号宇航员。

The Shenzhou-16 crew, consisting of veteran astronaut Jing Haipeng, Zhu Yangzhu and Gui Haichao, is scheduled to return to earth on Oct. 31.

由老航天员景海鹏、朱扬柱、桂海超组成的神舟十六号机组人员计划于10月31日返回地球。

Zhu and Gui, both in their 30s, are from China's third batch of astronauts.

朱和桂都是30多岁的人，都是中国第三批航天员。

Shenzhou-17 marks China's 12th crewed mission since Yang Liwei's solo spaceflight in October 2003, the first Chinese national in space.

神舟十七号是继2003年10月杨利伟单人航天飞行之后中国第12次载人飞行任务，杨利伟是中国第一个进入太空的人。

Reporting by Ryan Woo; Editing by Tom Hogue and Gerry Doyle

item.title: 中国月球研究站计划的伙伴国家
item.description:
Belarus this week joined China's International Lunar Research Station (ILRS) programme, the third country to sign up this month for a plan to eventually set up a permanently inhabited outpost on the moon's south pole.

白俄罗斯本周加入了中国的国际月球研究站（ILRS）计划，这是本月签署计划的第三个国家，该计划最终将在月球南极建立一个永久居住的前哨站。

Earlier in October, Pakistan and Azerbaijan joined the ILRS, a project jointly initiated by China and Russia in 2021 and widely seen as a rival to the U.S.

我们-led Artemis programme.

Lunar missions this decade will establish a "basic" version of the research station, followed by more missions in the 2030s to construct a "full" version of the base.

这十年的探月任务将建立一个“基本”版本的研究站，随后在 2030 年代将进行更多任务，以建造一个“完整”版本的基地。

By 2050, the ILRS is expected to be a fully operational station for lunar research, and potentially also a launch pad for crewed missions to other planets in the solar system.

到 2050 年，ILRS 预计将成为月球研究的全面运行站，也有可能成为前往太阳系其他行星的载人任务的发射台。

Note: (*) denotes founding member

注：(*)表示创始成员

item.title: 中国经济放缓加剧科技困境 WPP 再次下调前景
item.description:
Summary:
  • WPP cuts full-year forecast for second quarter in a row

    WPP 连续第二季度下调全年预期
  • Expects growth of 0.5-1.0, down from 1.5-3.0%

    预计增长 0.5-1.0%，低于 1.5-3.0%
  • Tech companies reluctant to spend, GroupM slows sharply

    科技公司不愿花钱，群邑大幅放缓
  • Shares fall as much as 5% to three-year low

    股价跌幅高达 5% 至三年来新低

Ad group WPP (WPP.L) cut its outlook for the second time in as many quarters on Thursday as tech clients continued to cut back on marketing, growth slowed sharply at its media buying agency GroupM and China disappointed.

周四，广告集团 WPP (WPP.L)在多个季度内第二次下调了预期，原因是科技客户继续削减营销支出，其媒体购买机构群邑 (GroupM) 的增长大幅放缓，而中国市场令人失望。

The British company, whose agencies include Ogilvy, said it now expected like-for-like growth for 2023 of 0.5-1.0%, down from the 1.5-3.0% it forecast in August and the up to 5% it expected earlier in the year.

这家代理机构包括奥美的英国公司表示，目前预计 2023 年同比增长率为 0.5-1.0%，低于 8 月份预测的 1.5-3.0% 和今年早些时候预测的高达 5% 。

"Our top-line performance in Q3 was below our expectations and continued to be impacted by the cautious spending trends we saw in Q2, particularly across technology clients with more impact from this felt in GroupM over the summer than the first half," CEO Mark Read said.

首席执行官 Mark 表示：“我们第三季度的营收表现低于预期，并继续受到第二季度谨慎支出趋势的影响，尤其是科技客户，今年夏天群邑受到的影响比上半年更大。”读说。

WPP's like-for-like revenue less pass-through costs fell 0.6% in the quarter while the market had expected 1.0% growth.

WPP 本季度的同比收入减去转嫁成本下降 0.6%，而市场预期增长 1.0%。

The performance trailed rivals Interpublic, which reported a 0.4% decrease, Omnicom, which recorded 3.3% growth, and Publicis, the strongest of the big four, with 5.3% growth.

该业绩落后于竞争对手 Interpublic（下降 0.4%）、Omnicom（增长 3.3%）和阳狮（四大巨头中最强的）（增长 5.3%）。

Read noted that Meta, which published results on Wednesday, had reduced marketing spend by 24%.

Read 指出，Meta 在周三公布了业绩，营销支出减少了 24%。

"Technology companies (...) are looking very carefully at their marketing expenses," he said in an interview. "But I do think in the long run that will correct itself."

“科技公司（……）正在非常仔细地考虑他们的营销费用，”他在接受采访时表示。 “但我确实认为从长远来看，这种情况会自行纠正。”

Its shares fell as much as 5% to a three-year low.

其股价跌幅高达 5%，跌至三年来的最低点。

Read said it was also a tougher quarter in China, where consumer spending had not returned as expected.

里德表示，这对中国来说也是一个更加艰难的季度，消费者支出没有按预期恢复。

Analysts at Citi said it was striking that the step down was "not necessarily caused by an intensification of the pressures in the second quarter but by a broadening of pressure".

花旗分析师表示，令人惊讶的是，此次下台“不一定是由于第二季度压力加剧，而是由于压力扩大”。

Growth at GroupM slowed sharply to 1.6% from 6.1% in the previous quarter, reflecting the impact of clients losses in the United States, as well as the technology slowdown, WPP said.

WPP 表示，群邑的增长率从上一季度的 6.1% 大幅放缓至 1.6%，反映出美国客户流失以及技术放缓的影响。

WPP said this month it would merge Wunderman Thompson and VMLY&R to create the industry's largest creative agency.

WPP 本月表示，将合并 Wunderman Thompson 和 VMLY&R，创建业内最大的创意机构。

Reporting by Paul Sandle; editing by William James and Jason Neely

item.title: 行业组织表示，欧盟必须在清洁技术竞赛中加大行动力度
item.description:
Europe's green technology industries and materials suppliers urged European Union leaders meeting for a summit on Thursday to do more to prevent the bloc dropping out of the global clean tech race against competitors China and the United States.

欧洲绿色技术行业和材料供应商敦促周四召开峰会的欧盟领导人采取更多措施，防止欧盟退出与中国和美国竞争对手的全球清洁技术竞赛。

The European Union is expected to pass legislation setting targets for EU-based companies to make at least 40% of the EU's annual deployment needs of solar, wind and other net-zero technologies by 2030.

欧盟预计将通过立法，为欧盟企业设定目标，到 2030 年，太阳能、风能和其他净零技术满足欧盟年度部署需求的至少 40%。

The bloc will also set targets to increase the domestic supply and processing of critical minerals.

欧盟还将制定增加关键矿产国内供应和加工的目标。

The heads of European associations representing solar, wind, hydrogen, batteries, chemicals and metals sectors said in a letter that China had established a growing footprint across most clean tech sectors and the United States had taken a decisive step with its Inflation Reduction Act (IRA).

代表太阳能、风能、氢能、电池、化学品和金属行业的欧洲协会负责人在一封信中表示，中国在大多数清洁技术行业的足迹不断扩大，而美国通过其《通货膨胀削减法案》（IRA）迈出了决定性的一步。 ）。

However, the letter to EU leaders and top EU officials said that Europe's investment situation had worsened since Russia's invasion of Ukraine, with high energy prices, inflation and growing supply risks.

不过，致欧盟领导人和欧盟高级官员的信中表示，自俄罗斯入侵乌克兰以来，欧洲投资形势恶化，能源价格高企、通货膨胀和供应风险加大。

EU leaders are due to discuss the competitiveness of industry and technology on Friday.

欧盟领导人将于周五讨论工业和技术的竞争力。

The letter said the European Union's focus over the next five years must be on industrial policy to boost the clean tech sector and its suppliers.

信中称，欧盟未来五年的重点必须放在产业政策上，以促进清洁技术行业及其供应商的发展。

The associations said the EU needed to ensure easier access to public financing, learning from the IRA, and fast-tracking of permits, such as for the 80 gigawatts of wind power projects still awaiting approval.

这些协会表示，欧盟需要确保更容易获得公共融资，向爱尔兰共和军学习，并快速审批许可证，例如仍在等待批准的 80 吉瓦风电项目。

Europe, the associations said, needed competitive energy prices, measures to protect against unfair practices of third countries and economic incentives to encourage procurement of local materials or components.

这些协会表示，欧洲需要有竞争力的能源价格、防止第三国不公平做法的措施以及鼓励采购当地材料或零部件的经济激励措施。

The associations said several quick fixes were possible this year and that industrial policy should be a key focus during the five-year term of the new European Commission formed next year.

这些协会表示，今年可能会采取一些快速解决办法，而产业政策应成为明年成立的新欧盟委员会五年任期的重点。

Reporting by Philip Blenkinsop; editing by Christina Fincher

菲利普·布伦金索普报道；克里斯蒂娜·芬奇编辑

item.title: 日元跌至一年低点后受到干预观察，美元走强
item.description:
The dollar was buoyant on Thursday, hovering at a near three-week high as Treasury yields rose and appetite for riskier currencies dimmed, while the yen briefly surged after breaching 150.50 per dollar, keeping traders jittery about intervention.

周四美元走强，徘徊在近三周高点，因美国国债收益率上升且对高风险货币的兴趣减弱，而日元在突破150.50兑美元后短暂飙升，令交易员对干预感到紧张。

The Japanese yen weakened to hit a fresh one-year low of 150.78 per dollar and was not far off the 32-year low of 151.94 it touched in October last year, which led to Japanese authorities intervening in the currency market.

日元走弱，触及一年新低150.78，距离去年10月触及的32年低点151.94不远，这导致日本当局干预汇市。

It briefly strengthened sharply to 149.865 before rebounding to its current level at 150.50, but analysts said this was unlikely to be intervention.

它短暂大幅走强至149.865，然后反弹至目前的150.50水平，但分析师表示这不太可能是干预。

"The move was less than one big figure. That tells me it wasn't intervention," said Niels Christensen, chief analyst at Nordea.

北欧联合银行（Nordea）首席分析师尼尔斯·克里斯滕森（Niels Christensen）表示：“这一举措还不到一个大数字。这告诉我这不是干预。”

"If it had been intervention we would have seen a bigger move," Christensen added.

克里斯滕森补充说：“如果是干预，我们会看到更大的举动。”

Japanese Finance Minister Shunichi Suzuki earlier warned traders against selling the yen again, saying authorities were closely watching moves.

日本财务大臣铃木俊一早些时候警告交易员不要再次抛售日元，称当局正在密切关注走势。

"I'm watching market moves with a sense of urgency, as before," he told reporters at his ministry.

“我像以前一样以紧迫感关注市场走势，”他在部长会议上对记者表示。

Suzuki made no direct comment about the potential for intervention.

铃木没有直接评论干预的可能性。

A recent surge in global interest rates is heightening pressure on the Bank of Japan to change its bond yield control next week. A hike to an existing yield cap set three months ago was being discussed as a possibility, sources told Reuters.

近期全球利率飙升加大了日本央行下周改变债券收益率控制的压力。 消息人士告诉路透社，正在讨论提高三个月前设定的现有收益率上限的可能性。

Japan's low yields have made the currency an easy target for short-sellers and funding trades, with the widening gap in the interest rates between Japan and the United States leading to persistent weakness in the yen.

日本的低收益率使得日元很容易成为卖空者和融资交易的目标，而日本和美国之间不断扩大的利差导致日元持续疲软。

The yen has fallen over 20% since the U.S.

我们 Federal Reserve began rapidly raising rates to combat inflation in March 2022, while the BOJ remains an outlier among central banks and has stuck to its ultra loose monetary policy.

U.S.

我们 GDP data due later on Thursday is a key event risk for dollar-yen, according to Carol Kong, currency strategist at Commonwealth Bank of Australia, who said a strong report may pressure U.S.

我们 yields higher and result in the yen testing fresh lows.

Benchmark U.S.

我们 10-year Treasury yields inched higher, resuming a move toward a 16-year peak above 5.0% briefly breached on Monday. The 10-year yield was at 4.9616% on Thursday.

SPOTLIGHT ON ECB

Investor focus will be on the policy decision from the European Central Bank later in the day, with the euro touching a week low of $1.0533 earlier in the session. The single currency was last down 0.2% at $1.0545.

投资者关注的焦点将是当天晚些时候欧洲央行的政策决定，欧元兑美元盘中早些时候触及一周低点1.0533美元。单一货币最后下跌 0.2% 至 1.0545 美元。

The ECB is expected to keep interest rates unchanged at a record high, snapping a 15-month streak of hikes. It may discuss a quicker reduction of its oversized portfolio of government debt as it battles excessive inflation.

预计欧洲央行将把利率维持在历史高位不变，结束15个月的连续加息。在应对过度通胀的过程中，它可能会讨论更快地削减其庞大的政府债务组合。

"The bottom line is that they will signal they are done for now," Nordea's Christensen said.

北欧联合银行的克里斯滕森表示：“最重要的是，他们会发出信号说他们已经完成了。”

"The euro is already on the defensive this morning and I think, if anything, the ECB will be more on the dovish side."

“今天早上欧元已经处于守势，我认为，如果有什么不同的话，欧洲央行将更加偏向鸽派。”

Sterling was last at $1.2081, down 0.2% on the day, having touched a three-week low of $1.2070 earlier in the session.

英镑最新报1.2081美元，当日下跌0.2%，盘中早些时候触及三周低点1.2070美元。

Against a basket of currencies, the dollar was 0.2% higher at 106.75 after touching a near three-week peak of 106.88.

美元兑一篮子货币上涨0.2%，至106.75，此前触及近三周高点106.88。

The Australian dollar slid to a one-year low of $0.6271 and was last flat at $0.6309.

澳元兑美元跌至一年低点0.6271美元，最后持平于0.6309美元。

A surprisingly high reading for inflation on Wednesday stoked expectations of a further hike in interest rates.

周三通胀数据出人意​​料地高，引发了进一步加息的预期。

The head of Australia's central bank on Thursday said the strong third-quarter inflation report was around policymakers' expectations, and they were still considering whether it would warrant a rate rise.

澳大利亚央行行长周四表示，强劲的第三季度通胀报告符合政策制定者的预期，他们仍在考虑是否需要加息。

The New Zealand dollar touched a near one-year low of $0.5774 and was last unchanged at $0.5802.

新西兰元兑美元触及近一年低点 0.5774 美元，最后持平于 0.5802 美元。

The Canadian dollar fell 0.1% versus the greenback to 1.38 per dollar after the Bank of Canada on Wednesday held its key overnight rate at 5.0% as expected but left the door open to more rate hikes to tame inflation.

加拿大央行周三如预期将关键隔夜利率维持在 5.0%，但为进一步加息以抑制通胀敞开了大门，加元兑美元汇率下跌 0.1%，至 1.38 美元兑 1.38 美元。

The Fed and the BOJ meet next week.

美联储和日本央行下周举行会议。

In cryptocurrencies, bitcoin last rose 0.6% to $34,714. The world's largest cryptocurrency has surged 15% this week on the back of speculation that an exchange-traded bitcoin fund is imminent.

加密货币方面，比特币上涨 0.6%，至 34,714 美元。由于市场猜测交易所交易的比特币基金即将成立，全球最大的加密货币本周飙升了 15%。

Reporting by Samuel Indyk in London and Ankur Banerjee in Singapore; Editing by Edwina Gibbs, Lincoln Feast, and Deborah Kyvrikosaios.

item.title: 渣打银行股价因中国风险敞口损失近 10 亿美元而暴跌
item.description:
Summary:
  • Shares fall as much as 17% before trading halt

    停牌前股价跌幅高达 17%
  • Bank books $700 mln hit on Bohai Bank stake

    渤海银行股权损失7亿美元
  • China slowdown also hits real estate exposure

    中国经济放缓也影响了房地产风险

StanChart shares fell as much as 17% in London on Thursday before trading was temporarily halted, after it announced a profit slump driven by a combined nearly $1 billion hit from its exposure to China's real estate and banking sectors.

周四，渣打银行股价在伦敦下跌了 17%，之后交易暂时停止，此前渣打银行宣布因中国房地产和银行业风险敞口合计近 10 亿美元的损失而导致利润大幅下滑。

The bank said pre-tax profit dropped 33% in the third quarter, far worse than analyst estimates, as it booked a $700 million impairment from its stake in China Bohai Bank (9668.HK), and a $186 million charge from Chinese commercial real estate.

该银行表示，第三季度税前利润下降了 33%，远低于分析师预期，因为该行因持有的渤海银行（9668.HK）股份计提了 7 亿美元的减值，并从中国商业房地产中扣除了 1.86 亿美元的费用。财产。

By 0713 GMT, Standard Chartered (STAN.L) shares were down 9%, set for their largest one-day fall since Feb. 24 last year, when Russia invaded Ukraine.

截至格林威治标准时间 0713，渣打银行(STAN.L)股价下跌 9%，创下自去年 2 月 24 日俄罗斯入侵乌克兰以来的最大单日跌幅。

The U.K.-headquartered bank, which earns most of its revenue in Asia, booked July-September statutory pretax profit of $633 million. That compared with $996 million a year earlier and the $1.41 billion average of 16 analyst estimates compiled by the bank.

这家总部位于英国的银行大部分收入来自亚洲，7月至9月的法定税前利润为6.33亿美元。相比之下，去年同期为 9.96 亿美元，该银行编制的 16 名分析师平均预测为 14.1 亿美元。

The hefty loss in China, where StanChart has based much of its expansion effort, underlines the challenge it faces to improve returns via exposure to the world's second-largest economy at a time of slowing growth and widening loss on loans.

渣打银行大部分扩张工作都集中在中国，而中国的巨额亏损突显了在经济增长放缓和贷款损失扩大之际，该公司在通过对世界第二大经济体的投资来提高回报方面所面临的挑战。

A raft of government easing measures have done little to allay China's economic fragility as crisis in its property market deepens with high-profile debt-repayment defaults and the absence of state support in the sector.

由于高调的债务偿还违约和国家对该行业缺乏支持，中国房地产市场危机不断加深，政府出台的一系列宽松措施对缓解中国经济的脆弱性收效甚微。

Domestic banking peers have reported squeezed margins while foreign banks, with smaller exposure, have started to take heftier blows as sentiment worsens and the government guides lenders to lower mortgage rates.

国内银行业同行报告利润率受到挤压，而风险敞口较小的外资银行则开始受到更大打击，因为市场情绪恶化以及政府引导贷款机构降低抵押贷款利率。

StanChart said the hit on its 16% stake in China Bohai, a lender in the eastern coastal city Tianjin, was due to lower forecast interest rates and decreased lending margins reported in the Chinese bank's half-year results.

渣打银行表示，其持有的渤海银行（东部沿海城市天津的一家银行）16%的股份受到打击，是由于该银行半年业绩中报告的预测利率较低以及贷款利润率下降。

China Bohai booked a 17.8% fall in January-June net interest income, leading to a nearly 7% decline in its overall profit, according to company filings.

公司文件显示，1-6月渤海净利息收入下降17.8%，导致其整体利润下降近7%。

StanChart's Chinese real estate exposure totalled $2.7 billion, down $200 million from the previous quarter.

渣打银行的中国房地产风险总额为27亿美元，比上一季度减少2亿美元。

The slump in valuation could potentially renew takeover interest in StanChart, after First Abu Dhabi Bank (FAB) in January this year said it had considered but abandoned a bid.

今年 1 月第一阿布扎比银行 (FAB) 表示已考虑但放弃了收购提议，估值暴跌可能会重新燃起对渣打银行的收购兴趣。

StanChart has recently had "no contact" with FAB, Chief Financial Officer Andy Halford told reporters on a conference call on Thursday.

渣打银行首席财务官安迪·哈尔福德 (Andy Halford) 在周四的电话会议上对记者表示，最近与 FAB“没有任何联系”。

'SOLID PERFORMANCE' IN OTHER BUSINESS

StanChart said it is confident of hitting its return-on-tangible-equity targets of 10% this year and 11% in 2024, but downgraded some other performance forecasts for the year.

渣打银行表示，有信心今年实现 10%、2024 年 11% 的有形股本回报率目标，但下调了今年其他一些业绩预测。

"Investors were expecting a clean set of third quarter numbers, and we do not have that today," said Jefferies analyst Joe Dickerson.

杰富瑞 (Jefferies) 分析师乔·迪克森 (Joe Dickerson) 表示：“投资者原本期待第三季度的数据清晰，但今天却没有。”

The "silver lining" for investors was the bank's underlying business performance - excluding impairment charges - remained solid, Dickerson said in a note to clients.

迪克森在给客户的一份报告中表示，投资者的“一线希望”是该银行的基本业务业绩（不包括减值费用）仍然稳健。

Net interest margin, a measure of return on lending, will now "approach" 1.7 percentage points rather than be "around" that level, StanChart said.

渣打银行表示，衡量贷款回报率的净息差现在将“接近”1.7个百分点，而不是“接近”该水平。

Rate-sensitive businesses received a boost, with income from transaction banking - the bulk in cash management services - increasing 42%.

利率敏感型业务得到提振，来自交易银行（现金管理服务的大部分）的收入增长了 42%。

Retail products saw 17% income growth, supported by a 50% rise in deposit product income.

零售产品收入增长 17%，存款产品收入增长 50%。

In the financial markets trading division, income fell 8% as reduced market volatility curbed client appetite for trading in products related to interest rates, commodities and foreign exchange.

在金融市场交易部门，由于市场波动性减弱抑制了客户对利率、大宗商品和外汇相关产品交易的兴趣，收入下降了 8%。

Reporting by Selena Li and Lawrence White; Editing by Christopher Cushing

A ministry spokeswoman was responding to a question at a regular briefing on the purpose of measures requiring export licences for some graphite products from Dec. 1.

item.title: 英国副首相：中国接受英国人工智能峰会邀请
item.description:
China has accepted Britain's invitation to attend a global summit on artificial intelligence next week, Deputy Prime Minister Oliver Dowden said on Thursday.

英国副首相奥利弗·道登周四表示，中国已接受英国邀请，出席下周举行的全球人工智能峰会。

"It is the case they've accepted, but we will wait to see everyone who actually turns up at the summit," Dowden told the BBC. "As things stands, yes, we do expect them to come."

道登告诉英国广播公司：“他们已经接受了这种情况，但我们将等待看到真正出现在峰会上的每个人。” “就目前情况而言，是的，我们确实希望他们来。”

Britain is bringing together representatives of AI companies, political leaders and experts on Nov. 1-2 to discuss what some see as the risks posed by AI, with an aim of building an international consensus on its safe development.

英国将于 11 月 1 日至 2 日召集人工智能公司代表、政治领导人和专家，讨论一些人认为的人工智能带来的风险，旨在就人工智能的安全发展达成国际共识。

item.title: 中美会面为拜登-习近平峰会铺平道路，中东成为焦点
item.description:
Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi begins a long-anticipated visit to Washington on Thursday, as the U.S.

我们 and China seek to manage deep strategic differences and pave the way for an expected summit between presidents Joe Biden and Xi Jinping.

The Middle East war has added a fresh dynamic to the testy relationship between the superpowers and Washington is hoping Beijing could use its influence with Iran to help ensure the Israel-Hamas conflict does not spread to the wider region.

中东战争给超级大国之间紧张的关系增添了新的活力，华盛顿希望北京能够利用其对伊朗的影响力来帮助确保以色列与哈马斯的冲突不会蔓延到更广泛的地区。

However, while both Beijing and Washington have spoken of looking for areas where they can work together, and Xi on Wednesday said China was willing to cooperate on global challenges, experts do not expect immediate progress.

然而，尽管北京和华盛顿都谈到寻找可以合作的领域，而且习近平周三表示中国愿意就全球挑战进行合作，但专家预计不会立即取得进展。

The Biden administration's priority with Beijing has been to prevent intense competition between the world's two largest economies and disagreements on a host of issues from trade to Taiwan and the South China Sea veering into conflict.

拜登政府与北京的首要任务是防止世界两大经济体之间的激烈竞争，以及防止在贸易、台湾和南海等一系列问题上的分歧演变成冲突。

U.S.

我们 Secretary of State Antony Blinken will welcome Wang at the State Department on Thursday, and he told the U.N. Security Council on Tuesday he would work with him to prevent the Middle East conflict from spreading.

Policy analysts in China and the U.S.

我们 say both sides share an interest in averting a wider war and that China, as a major oil purchaser, has considerable influence it could exert on Iran.

But whether Beijing will use it remains to be seen and experts say China may instead watch from the sidelines for a while longer.

但北京是否会使用它还有待观察，专家表示，中国可能会继续观望一段时间。

"The Chinese certainly have an interest in preventing a direct U.S.

我们-Iranian confrontation, as they are major oil consumers and that would spike prices," said Jon Alterman, head of the Middle East program at Washington's Center for Strategic and International Studies.

"Still, the Chinese are unlikely to do any heavy lifting here. I expect they'll want a seat at the table when the Israel-Gaza struggle gets resolved, but they don't feel much need or ability to hasten resolution."

“不过，中国人不太可能在这里做任何繁重的工作。我预计，当以色列和加沙的斗争得到解决时，他们会希望在谈判桌上占有一席之地，但他们觉得没有太大的必要或能力来加速解决。”

WANG, BIDEN

Shi Yinhong, professor of international relations at Renmin University of China, said Beijing exerting its influence over Iran was "almost the only serious and practical U.S.

我们 expectation of China on the Middle East situation."

However Shi added: "The U.S.

我们 position on Iran is far from acceptable to China and vice versa. Mutual compromise on this issue could be too limited and small to be of any significance."

Washington has stressed the importance of China's ability to influence Iran. Blinken, during a whirlwind Middle East trip last week, spoke by phone to Wang and asked him to use Beijing's clout to ensure the conflict does not widen.

华盛顿强调了中国影响伊朗的能力的重要性。布林肯上周在中东之行期间与王通电话，要求他利用北京的影响力确保冲突不会扩大。

China has called for restraint and a ceasefire in response to Israel's bombardment of Gaza in retaliation for an Oct. 7 attack by Hamas that Israel says killed 1,400 people. Retaliatory Israeli airstrikes have killed over 6,500 people, the health ministry in Hamas-ruled Gaza said on Wednesday. Reuters has not been able to independently verify the casualty figures of either side.

中国呼吁各方保持克制并停火，以回应以色列对加沙的轰炸，以报复哈马斯 10 月 7 日发动的袭击，以色列称此次袭击造成 1,400 人死亡。哈马斯统治的加沙卫生部周三表示，以色列的报复性空袭已造成 6,500 多人死亡。路透社尚未能够独立核实双方的伤亡数字。

"China has been working tirelessly to promote the cessation of hostilities and the restoration of peace. We have been maintaining close communication with the parties concerned," China's U.N. Ambassador Zhang Jun said on Tuesday.

中国驻联合国大使张军周二表示：“中国一直在为推动停止敌对行动、恢复和平作出不懈努力。我们一直与有关各方保持着密切沟通。”

Wang's visit to Washington comes after several top U.S.

我们 officials, including Blinken, visited Beijing in the past several months.

The veteran Chinese diplomat is expected to meet Biden's national security adviser, Jake Sullivan, on Friday. He is also expected to speak with Biden during his visit to the White House, according to two U.S.

我们 officials, although it is unclear how substantial their interaction will be.

PATH TO BIDEN-XI MEETING

Analysts expect the discussions to focus on preparations for an anticipated meeting between Biden and Xi on the sidelines of the summit of Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) countries in San Francisco from Nov. 11 to 17. It would be Biden and Xi's first in-person meeting since a summit in Bali last November.

分析人士预计，讨论的重点将是拜登和习近平将于 11 月 11 日至 17 日在旧金山举行的亚太经合组织 (APEC) 国家峰会期间举行的会晤的准备工作。这将是拜登和习近平的首次会面。自去年 11 月巴厘岛峰会以来，人们一直在聚会。

"There are substantive things to be ironed out and finalized," said Yun Sun, director of the China Program at Washington's Stimson Center. "(Wang) will be here for the negotiations only - the big deliverables will be reserved for the top leaders to announce."

华盛顿史汀生中心中国项目主任孙云表示，“有一些实质性的事情需要解决和敲定。” “（王）来这里只是为了谈判——重要的成果将留待最高领导人宣布。”

On Wednesday, Xi said whether Washington and Beijing could establish the "right" way of getting along and managing their differences would be crucial to the world.

周三，习近平表示，华盛顿和北京能否建立“正确”的相处方式并管理分歧，对世界至关重要。

The two sides go into APEC from different economic perspectives, with economic policy analysts saying the U.S.

我们 has weathered challenging global conditions after the COVID-19 pandemic somewhat better than China.

U.S.

我们 and Chinese officials held a virtual meeting on Monday on macroeconomic developments, talks the U.S.

我们 called "productive and substantive" and China called "in-depth, frank and constructive."

U.S.

我们 officials said Taiwan and the South and East China Seas, where they accused Beijing of "destabilizing and dangerous actions" against rival territorial claimants, would also be on the agenda.

They said re-establishing military-to-military ties with China remained a top U.S.

我们 priority to avoid unintended conflict.

China's Global Times tabloid highlighted contradictions in relations.

中国的《环球时报》小报强调了两国关系中的矛盾。

"Although Sino-U.S.

我们 interactions have seen a rapid recovery in different fields," the U.S.

我们 policy of attempting to "contain" China had not changed, it said, accusing Washington of "two-faced tactics" in which it "frequently takes various opportunities to discredit China and create friction."

Reporting by Humeyra Pamuk and David Brunnstrom in Washington and Laurie Chen in Beijing; Additional reporting by Trevor Hunnicutt Editing by Josie Kao

Humeyra Pamuk 和 David Brunnstrom 在华盛顿以及 Laurie Chen 在北京的报道； Trevor Hunnicutt 的补充报道 Josie Kao 编辑

item.title: 亏损加剧野村重新评估中国大陆业务计划
item.description:
Nomura Holdings (8604.T) said on Thursday it is reassessing its mainland China business, as losses mount at its Shanghai-based securities joint venture in another blow to the top Japanese investment bank's global expansion strategy.

野村控股(8604.T)周四表示，正在重新评估其中国大陆业务，因为其位于上海的合资证券公司亏损加剧，这对这家日本顶级投行的全球扩张战略造成了又一次打击。

Nomura's majority-owned joint venture has struggled to grow since its launch in 2019, dragged down by the pandemic and a slowing economy.

野村控股的合资企业自 2019 年成立以来，受疫情和经济放缓的拖累，增长举步维艰。

In 2022, the joint venture lost 225 million yuan ($30.75 million), after losing 84 million yuan in 2021, according to Nomura's filings.

野村证券的文件显示，继 2021 年亏损 8400 万元人民币之后，2022 年该合资企业亏损 2.25 亿元人民币（3075 万美元）。

"With a presence in China for over four decades since 1982, we have consistently sought to contribute to the development of the country's capital markets and service the evolving needs of clients," Nomura said in a statement.

野村证券在一份声明中表示：“自 1982 年以来，我们在中国开展业务已超过 40 年，我们始终致力于为中国资本市场的发展做出贡献，并满足客户不断变化的需求。”

"That strategy remains unchanged. Having now fully emerged from the pandemic, we are working constructively with our joint venture partners to determine the most viable path for our onshore business to achieve this long-term objective," it said.

该公司表示：“这一战略保持不变。现在已经完全摆脱了疫情的影响，我们正在与合资伙伴进行建设性合作，以确定我们的陆上业务实现这一长期目标的最可行途径。”

Nomura's China joint venture headcount has dropped to 259 from 281 in July, far short of the original target of increasing it to 500 by this year.

野村证券在中国的合资企业员工人数已从7月份的281人减少至259人，远未达到今年将其增加到500人的原定目标。

While Nomura declined to comment on the reason for the drop, Bloomberg, which first reported the news, said the joint venture has cut jobs and seen a number of departures following a management reshuffle earlier this year.

虽然野村证券拒绝就业绩下降的原因发表评论，但最先报道这一消息的彭博社表示，在今年早些时候进行管理层改组后，该合资企业已经裁员，并有多名员工离职。

The review comes as the Japanese investment bank is cutting its investment bankers in Hong Kong. Reuters reported that Nomura has laid off about 10 of its Hong Kong-based bankers, including some who were focused on China-related deals.

此次审查是在这家日本投资银行正在裁减其在香港的投资银行家之际进行的。路透社报道称，野村证券已解雇了约 10 名驻香港银行家，其中包括一些专注于中国相关交易的银行家。

Leading U.S.

我们 and European banks, such as Goldman Sachs and Citigroup, have launched rounds of layoffs this year in their Asia investment banking units.

Nomura received final regulatory approval to launch the joint venture, Nomura Orient International Securities, in 2019, as part of Beijing's move to open its financial sector up to foreign firms.

野村证券于 2019 年获得监管部门的最终批准，成立合资企业野村东方国际证券，这是北京向外国公司开放金融业举措的一部分。

Its original plan called on the joint venture to initially focus on wealth management and eventually expand to wholesale businesses, including investment banking and trading.

其最初的计划是，合资公司最初专注于财富管理，最终扩展到批发业务，包括投资银行和贸易。

The joint venture is 51% owned by Nomura, 24.9% by Orient International Holding, and 24.1% by Shanghai Huangpu Investment Holding Group.

该合资公司由野村证券持股51%，东方国际控股持股24.9%，上海黄浦投资控股集团持股24.1%。

($1 = 7.3172 Chinese yuan renminbi)

item.title: 澳大利亚警方在与中国有组织犯罪有关的洗钱行动中逮捕了七人
item.description:
Australian police have arrested seven members of an alleged Chinese crime syndicate for laundering hundreds of millions of dollars through one of the country's largest money remitters after a giant sting operation involving U.S.

我们 Homeland Security.

Police said on Thursday the Chinese Long River crime syndicate allegedly laundered A$229 million ($143 million) through the Changjiang Currency Exchange, one of the country's largest independently-owned remitters with dozens of shops nationwide, between 2020 and 2023.

警方周四表示，中国长河犯罪集团涉嫌在 2020 年至 2023 年间通过长江货币交易所洗钱 2.29 亿澳元（合 1.43 亿美元）。长江货币交易所是中国最大的独立汇款机构之一，在全国拥有数十家商店。

More than 330 police and other specialists arrested seven alleged members of the syndicate, including four Chinese nationals, on Wednesday during 20 search warrants across five states.

周三，超过 330 名警察和其他专家在五个州发出 20 次搜查令，逮捕了 7 名涉嫌该犯罪团伙的成员，其中包括 4 名中国公民。

“This alleged syndicate was operating in plain sight with shiny shopfronts across the country – it was not operating in the shadows like other money laundering organisations,” Australian Federal Police Eastern Command Assistant Commissioner Stephen Dametto said in a statement on Thursday.

澳大利亚联邦警察东部司令部助理局长史蒂芬·达梅托（Stephen Dametto）周四在一份声明中表示：“这个涉嫌犯罪集团在全国各地都有光鲜亮丽的店面，在众目睽睽之下进行活动，它不像其他洗钱组织那样在暗处运作。”

Investigators suspicions were first raised when the exchange opened new branches during COVID despite the pandemic meaning many of its international tourist and student customers had returned home, according to Dametto.

达梅托表示，调查人员首次提出怀疑是在该交易所在新冠疫情期间开设新分行时，尽管大流行意味着许多国际游客和学生客户已经回国。

A formal investigation, codenamed Operation Avarus-Nightwolf began in August 2022 with the help of six other agencies, including the U.S.

我们 Department of Homeland Security Investigations.

Police allege the syndicate camouflaged the proceeds of cyber scams, illicit goods trafficking and other crime within the exchange's mostly lawful daily transactions, which were as high as A$100 million.

警方称，该犯罪团伙在该交易所大部分合法的日常交易中掩盖了网络诈骗、非法商品贩运和其他犯罪的收益，金额高达 1 亿澳元。

The proceeds allegedly funded an extravagant lifestyle of expensive restaurants, private jets and luxury homes, one valued at more than A$10 million. Police have quarantined more than A$50 million in assets.

据称，所得收益用于资助奢侈的生活方式，包括昂贵的餐厅、私人飞机和豪华住宅，其中一套价值超过 1000 万澳元。警方已查封超过 5000 万澳元的资产。

Police also alleged the syndicate had purchased fake passports, valued at A$200,000 each, in case members needed to flee Australia.

警方还指控该集团购买了每本价值 20 万澳元的假护照，以防成员需要逃离澳大利亚。

The seven arrested, aged between 35 to 40, will appear in a Melbourne court on Thursday.

七名被捕者年龄在 35 岁至 40 岁之间，将于周四在墨尔本法庭出庭。

($1 = 1.5931 Australian dollars)

（1 美元 = 1.5931 澳元）

Reporting by Lewis Jackson; Editing by Michael Perry

item.title: 特斯拉供应商西拉预计在中国出口禁令之前购买更多石墨
item.description:
Australian producer Syrah Resources (SYR.AX) on Thursday said it expects buyers outside of China to step up their purchases of natural graphite before stricter export controls on the battery material came into effect on December 1.

澳大利亚生产商 Syrah Resources (SYR.AX)周四表示，预计中国以外的买家将在 12 月 1 日对电池材料实施更严格的出口管制之前加大对天然石墨的采购。

China, the world's largest graphite producer and exporter, will require export permits as of Dec. 1 for some graphite products, including spherical graphite used by electric vehicle makers.

中国是全球最大的石墨生产国和出口国，自12月1日起，部分石墨产品将需要出口许可证，其中包括电动汽车制造商使用的球形石墨。

Syrah, which has a supply deal with Tesla (TSLA.O), mines graphite at its Balama operations in Mozambique and is building a plant in Louisiana where it will produce active anode material (AAM) for batteries. In May, it paused mining at Balama after oversupply hit prices.

Syrah 与特斯拉(TSLA.O)签订了供应协议，在莫桑比克的巴拉马工厂开采石墨，并正在路易斯安那州建设一家工厂，生产电池活性阳极材料 (AAM)。 5 月份，由于供应过剩影响了价格，该公司暂停了巴拉马 (Balama) 的开采。

The export controls could mean that automakers and suppliers of battery materials will have to accelerate their search for alterative sources of the mineral.

出口管制可能意味着汽车制造商和电池材料供应商将不得不加快寻找替代矿物来源。

Syrah said that, based on feedback from its customers and analysts, buyers are looking to stockpile graphite to reduce the risk of near-term supply disruptions ahead of the ban, and ahead of China's winter when it tends to produce less natural graphite.

Syrah表示，根据客户和分析师的反馈，买家希望在禁令实施之前以及中国冬季天然石墨产量趋于减少的冬季之前储存石墨，以降低近期供应中断的风险。

"Any disruption or reduction in China anode precursor or AAM export supply without replacement supply would impact battery production outside China," it said.

“中国阳极前驱体或 AAM 出口供应的任何中断或减少而没有替代供应，都将影响中国以外的电池生产，”它表示。

Uncertainties regarding the impact of the controls on Chinese supply is expected to continue into 2024, Syrah added, but for now, it does not expect any near-term "meaningful" impact demand from China on its Mozambique project.

Syrah补充说，中国供应管制影响的不确定性预计将持续到2024年，但目前预计中国近期不会对其莫桑比克项目的需求产生任何“有意义”的影响。

"Although the impacts of implementation are not yet known, the announced graphite export controls in China are increasing Government and private sector attention on the strategic importance of Syrah as a unique ex-China natural graphite and AAM supplier in the battery supply chain," the company said in a statement.

“虽然实施的影响尚不清楚，但中国宣布的石墨出口管制正在增加政府和私营部门对 Syrah 作为电池供应链中独特的前中国天然石墨和 AAM 供应商的战略重要性的关注，”公司在一份声明中表示。

Syrah's comments come as Australian government officials visit the United States to shore up cooperation over critical minerals.

西拉发表此番言论之际，澳大利亚政府官员正在访问美国，以加强关键矿产方面的合作。

Shares in Syrah spiked to 43% to A$0.95 a share on Friday when the export bans were announced before trading at $0.66 cents on Thursday.

周五宣布出口禁令后，西拉股价飙升 43%，至每股 0.95 澳元，周四交易价格为 0.66 美分。

The U.S.

我们 International Development Finance Corporation (DFC) last month approved a loan of up to $150 million for Syrah's Mozambique operations.

Reporting by Roushni Nair in Bengaluru and Melanie Burton in Melbourne, editing by Miral Fahmy

item.title: 随着美国的打压，中国急于用国内技术替代西方技术
item.description:
Summary:
  • Beijing has increased spending on domestic tech since late 2022

    自 2022 年底以来，北京增加了国内科技支出
  • Telecoms and banks likely next to be pushed to use more Chinese products

    接下来可能会推动电信和银行使用更多中国产品
  • Replacing Western tech due to geopolitics and cyberattack fears

    由于地缘政治和网络攻击的担忧而取代西方技术
  • Foreign firms still dominant in banking-related software

    外国公司在银行相关软件领域仍占主导地位

China has stepped up spending to replace Western-made technology with domestic alternatives as Washington tightens curbs on high-tech exports to its rival, according to government tenders, research documents and four people familiar with the matter.

据政府招标、研究文件和四位知情人士透露，随着华盛顿收紧对其竞争对手高科技出口的限制，中国加大了支出，用国内替代品取代西方制造的技术。

Reuters is reporting for the first time details of tenders from the government, military and state-linked entities, which show an acceleration in domestic substitution since last year.

路透社首次报道了来自政府、军方和国家相关实体的招标细节，这表明自去年以来国内替代正在加速。

China has spent heavily on replacing computer equipment, and the telecom and financial sectors are probably the next target, said two people familiar with the industries. State-backed researchers also identified digital payments as particularly vulnerable to possible Western hacking, according to a review of their work, making a push to indigenize such technology likely.

两位熟悉该行业的人士表示，中国在更换计算机设备上投入了大量资金，电信和金融行业可能是下一个目标。根据对他们工作的审查，国家支持的研究人员还发现，数字支付特别容易受到西方黑客的攻击，因此有可能推动此类技术的本土化。

The number of tenders from state-owned enterprises (SOEs), government and military bodies to nationalize equipment doubled to 235 from 119 in the 12 months after September 2022, according to a finance ministry database seen by Reuters.

路透社看到的财政部数据库显示，2022 年 9 月后的 12 个月内，国有企业、政府和军事机构的设备国有化招标数量从 119 起翻了一番，达到 235 起。

In the same period, the value of awarded projects listed on the database totaled 156.9 million yuan, or more than triple the previous year.

同期，入库的获奖项目价值总计1.569亿元，是上年的三倍多。

While the database represents only a fraction of tender bids nationwide, it is the largest collection of state tenders publicly available and mirrors third-party data. China spent 1.4 trillion yuan ($191 billion) replacing foreign hardware and software in 2022, marking a year-on-year increase of 16.2%, according to IT research firm First New Voice.

虽然该数据库仅代表全国招标的一小部分，但它是公开可用的最大的国家招标集合，并反映了第三方数据。 IT 研究公司 First New Voice 的数据显示，2022 年中国在更换外国硬件和软件方面的支出为 1.4 万亿元人民币（1910 亿美元），同比增长 16.2%。

But Beijing's lack of advanced chip-manufacturing capabilities prevents it from completely substituting products with alternatives that are entirely locally made, analysts say.

但分析人士表示，北京缺乏先进的芯片制造能力，使其无法用完全本地制造的替代品完全替代产品。

Previous domestic substitution efforts stalled because China did not have the "technical chops to pull off localization until now, and to a certain extent they still kind of don't," said Kendra Schaefer, head of tech policy research at Beijing-based consultancy Trivium China.

北京咨询公司 Trivium 技术政策研究主管肯德拉·谢弗 (Kendra Schaefer) 表示，之前的国内替代努力陷入停滞，因为中国“直到现在还不具备实现本地化的技术能力，而且在某种程度上仍然不具备”。中国。

FEAR OF DEPENDENCE

SOEs were instructed last year to replace office software systems with domestic products by 2027, the first time such specific deadlines were imposed, according to five brokerage firms that cited a September 2022 order from China's state asset regulator. Reuters could not independently verify the order.

五家券商援引中国国有资产监管机构 2022 年 9 月的命令称，去年，国有企业被要求在 2027 年之前用国产产品更换办公软件系统，这是首次规定这样的具体期限。路透社无法独立核实该订单。

Domestic replacement projects this year have targeted markedly sensitive infrastructure, the tenders show.

招标显示，今年的国内更换项目主要针对敏感的基础设施。

One partially redacted tender for a "certain government department in Gansu province" assigned 4.4 million yuan to replace an intelligence-gathering system's equipment, without providing specifics.

一份经过部分修改的招标书为“甘肃省某政府部门”拨款 440 万元人民币，用于更换情报收集系统的设备，但没有提供具体细节。

People's Liberation Army units in the northeastern city of Harbin and Xiamen in the south last December meanwhile issued tenders to replace foreign-made computers.

去年12月，位于东北城市哈尔滨和南部城市厦门的中国人民解放军部队同时发布了更换外国制造计算机的招标。

Tech researchers such as Mo Jianlei of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, the country's largest state-run research organization, said the Chinese government was increasingly concerned about Western equipment being hacked by foreign powers.

中国最大的国有研究机构中国科学院的莫建雷等科技研究人员表示，中国政府越来越担心西方设备遭到外国势力的黑客攻击。

The state asset regulator did not return a request for comment.

国有资产监管机构没有回复置评请求。

Over the past year, state-linked researchers also called on Beijing to strengthen anti-hacking defences in its financial infrastructure due to geopolitical concerns.

过去一年，出于地缘政治担忧，与国家相关的研究人员还呼吁北京加强金融基础设施的反黑客防御。

One March research paper highlighted the dependence of China's UnionPay credit card system on U.S software firm BMC for settlements.

3 月份的一篇研究论文强调了中国银联信用卡系统对美国软件公司 BMC 结算的依赖。

"Beware of security vulnerabilities in hardware and software set by the U.S.

我们 side ... build a financial security 'firewall'," the researchers wrote.

BMC declined to comment.

BMC 拒绝置评。

An article published this year in the journal Cyberspace Security by researchers from the state-run China Telecommunications Corporation concluded the country was overdependent on chips made by U.S.

我们 giant Qualcomm (QCOM.O) for back-end management, as well as on the iOS and Android systems.

"(They) are all firmly controlled by American companies," the researchers wrote.

“（它们）都被美国公司牢牢控制，”研究人员写道。

As China has not signed World Trade Organization clauses governing public procurement, the substitution effort does not appear to violate international accords, according to the U.S.

我们 Treasury. The U.S.

我们 has implemented similar rules barring Chinese companies from public sector bids.

Qualcomm, Google (GOOGL.O) and Apple (AAPL.O) did not immediately return requests for comment.

高通、谷歌(GOOGL.O)和苹果(AAPL.O)没有立即回复置评请求。

WINNERS AND LOSERS

China's effort to build an independent computing system dates back to at least its 2006 five-year plan for science and technology development, which listed the semiconductor and software systems sectors as national priorities.

中国建立独立计算系统的努力至少可以追溯到2006年的科技发展五年计划，该计划将半导体和软件系统行业列为国家优先发展领域。

This effort spawned state-owned companies that are increasingly winning major contracts. Two firms awarded the Harbin tenders were subsidiaries of China Electronics Corporation and China Electronics Technology Group Corporation - both heavily targeted by U.S.

我们 sanctions.

The state regulator's 2022 order pushed SOEs away from U.S.

我们 companies such as Microsoft (MSFT.O) and Adobe (ADBE.O), according to an employee of a Beijing-based firm that develops domestic office-processing software

China Tobacco, for example, in July began switching some subsidiaries from Microsoft Windows to Huawei's EulerOS, according to an employee of a software vendor that services the state-owned manufacturer.

例如，据为该国有制造商提供服务的软件供应商的一名员工透露，中国烟草于 7 月开始将部分子公司从微软 Windows 切换到华为的 EulerOS。

The people spoke on condition of anonymity because they were not authorized to discuss clients and competitors.

这些人士要求匿名，因为他们无权讨论客户和竞争对手。

For years, Western tech companies have shared their source code and entered into partnerships with domestic firms to address Beijing's concerns, but prominent computer scientists such as Ni Guangnan of the Chinese Academy of Engineering have said such measures are not sufficient for China's security needs.

多年来，西方科技公司一直共享源代码并与国内公司建立合作伙伴关系，以解决北京方面的担忧，但中国工程院院士倪光南等著名计算机科学家表示，此类措施不足以满足中国的安全需求。

China Tobacco, Microsoft and Adobe did not respond to requests for comment.

中国烟草、微软和Adobe没有回应置评请求。

In September, Reuters and other outlets reported that some employees of central government agencies were banned from using iPhones at work.

9 月，路透社和其他媒体报道称，中央政府机构的一些员工被禁止在工作中使用 iPhone。

"In certain sectors, customers ... are opting for domestic suppliers, with foreign suppliers frequently facing informal barriers," the European Union Chamber of Commerce in Beijing said in response to Reuters questions.

“在某些领域，客户……正在选择国内供应商，而外国供应商经常面临非正式障碍，”北京欧盟商会在回答路透社的问题时表示。

In a 2023 American Chamber of Commerce (AmCham) in Shanghai report, 89% of the organization's tech business members named procurement practices favoring domestic competitors as a regulatory obstacle. It was the highest percentage of any sector.

在上海美国商会 (AmCham) 2023 年的一份报告中，该组织 89% 的科技企业成员将有利于国内竞争对手的采购做法视为监管障碍。这是所有行业中比例最高的。

AmCham Shanghai President Eric Zheng acknowledged China's national security concerns but said he hoped "normal procurement procedures will not be politicized so that US companies can compete fairly and pursue commercial opportunities ... to benefit both countries."

上海美国商会会长郑重承认中国的国家安全担忧，但表示希望“正常采购程序不会被政治化，以便美国公司能够公平竞争并寻求商业机会……让两国受益。”

The U.S.

我们 Department of Commerce, China Electronics Corporation and China Electronics Technology Group Corporation did not return requests for comment.

HUAWEI PRIZED

Chinese tech conglomerate Huawei has emerged as the leading firm in this replacement cycle, according to three people familiar with China's enterprise tech industry, who spoke on condition of anonymity given the sensitivity of the issue.

据三位熟悉中国企业科技行业的人士透露，中国科技集团华为已成为这一更换周期中的领头羊。考虑到问题的敏感性，这些人士要求匿名。

In 2022, Huawei's enterprise business, which includes software and cloud computing operations, reported 133 billion yuan in sales, up 30% on the previous year.

2022年，包括软件和云计算业务在内的华为企业业务销售额达1330亿元人民币，较上年增长30%。

One of the people said privately-held Huawei was seen as more nimble than state-owned groups in rolling out products and executing projects.

其中一位人士表示，私营企业华为在推出产品和执行项目方面被认为比国有企业更加灵活。

The other two sources highlighted Huawei's broad product suite - spanning chips to software - as an advantage.

另外两位消息人士强调了华为广泛的产品系列（从芯片到软件）的优势。

Clients also prize Huawei for its ability to process data on internal company servers and external cloud networks, as well as its wide offering of cybersecurity products, according to the employee of a China Tobacco tech supplier.

据中烟一家技术供应商的员工称，客户还因其处理公司内部服务器和外部云网络数据的能力以及提供广泛的网络安全产品而对华为表示赞赏。

Huawei declined to comment.

华为拒绝置评。

The replacement drive has re-drawn entire sub-sectors of the software industry. The combined China market share held by five major foreign makers of database management systems – the majority of which are American - dropped from 57.3% in 2018 to 27.3% by the end of 2022, according to industry group IDC.

更换驱动器重新绘制了软件行业的整个子行业。根据行业组织 IDC 的数据，五家主要外国数据库管理系统制造商（其中大部分是美国制造商）在中国的市场份额合计从 2018 年的 57.3% 下降到 2022 年底的 27.3%。

Despite heavy spending on domestic substitution, however, foreign firms are still dominant suppliers for banking and telecoms database management. Non-Chinese companies held 90% of market share for banking database systems at the end of 2022, according to EqualOcean, a tech consultancy.

然而，尽管在国内替代方面投入了大量资金，外国公司仍然是银行和电信数据库管理的主要供应商。根据科技咨询公司 EqualOcean 的数据，截至 2022 年底，非中国公司占据了银行数据库系统 90% 的市场份额。

Financial institutions are generally reluctant to switch database systems despite government pressure, said one of the industry sources, adding that they have higher stability requirements than many other sectors and local players cannot yet match their needs.

一位业内人士表示，尽管有政府压力，金融机构普遍不愿更换数据库系统，并补充说，金融机构对稳定性的要求比许多其他行业更高，而本地企业还无法满足他们的需求。

Even for personal computers, banks that switch from an international brand to China's dominant supplier Lenovo (0992.HK) would still be reliant on critical chip components provided by Western firms, one of the industry sources said.

一位业内消息人士称，即使在个人电脑方面，从国际品牌转向中国主要供应商联想（0992.HK）的银行仍将依赖西方公司提供的关键芯片组件。
